summary:
This mod adds the book \"Goodnight Mundus\" to the game.

\"Goodnight Mundus\" is a lullaby released by Zenimax Online to promote \"Elder Scrolls Online\" - and this book adds the text from the lullaby to the game, to be found on sale randomly by booksellers.

The original lullaby can be watched here - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ijLyD3z6u4
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the book \"Goodnight Mundus\" to the game.

\"Goodnight Mundus\" is a lullaby released by Zenimax Online to promote \"Elder Scrolls Online\" - and this book adds the text from the lullaby to the game, to be found on sale randomly by booksellers.

The original lullaby can be watched here - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ijLyD3z6u4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ijLyD3z6u4[/url]



INSTALLATION
Use NMM or simply drag the esp into your data folder


COMPATIBILITY
This mod is compatible with the vast majority of mods -
If you use other mods that edit merchant lists, then in order for this book appear this mod must be later in your load order than the other mods, or you must use Wrye Bash to merge the lists to make the mods compatible.


If you like this mod, you might also be interested in ABCS for Barbarians - Skyrim Edition - found at [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12270]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12270[/url] - updated with new illustrations for Skyrim!
author: jackstarr
